about_the_game:
This pack features an exclusive outfit for Ronin, a spooky wingsuit, and a reactive weapon wrap that can be used on any weapon type.

Includes:
- Radioactive Revenant Ronin
- Radioactive Revenant Primary, Secondary,& Melee Weapon Wraps
- Radioactive Revenant Wingsuit
detailed_description:
This pack features an exclusive outfit for Ronin, a spooky wingsuit, and a reactive weapon wrap that can be used on any weapon type.

Includes:
- Radioactive Revenant Ronin
- Radioactive Revenant Primary, Secondary,& Melee Weapon Wraps
- Radioactive Revenant Wingsuit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: This pack features an exclusive outfit for Ronin, a spooky wingsuit, and a reactive weapon wrap that can be used on any weapon type. Includes: - Radioactive Revenant Ronin - Radioactive Revenant Primary, Secondary,& Melee Weapon Wraps - Radioactive Revenant Wingsuit
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
